data.oai_dc:dc: This dataset contains the digitized treatments in Plazi based on the original journal article Vilkamaa, Pekka, Menzel, Frank (2017): Descriptions of new species of the genera Camptochaeta Hippa & Vilkamaa and Corynoptera Winnertz (Diptera, Sciaridae) from the Holarctic. Zootaxa 4353 (2): 347-359, DOI: https://doi.org/10.11646/zootaxa.4353.2.6|27 occurrences
